properties.fun_facts: Installed in 1975, the Vaillancourt Fountain is officially titled, "Québec Libre!". The night before the sculpture's inauguration, artist Armand Vaillancourt inscribed "Québec libre!" in red letters on the sculpture. The next day when he noticed that the note had been erased, Vaillancourt jumped on the statue to re-inscribe his message.
